channel.title: Adding extra options to an item
channel.description:
So I am working on adding a donator rank ticket to a pi server.
I'm using the item 1464 (archery ticket)
So far I have changed everything just working on adding a "claim option" - This I need help with... Also I have in actionhandler.java to give player the rank and log them off upon this item but I don't know how to specify it so if I added the "claim" option then a player could click claim and have the rank.

item.title: Adding extra options to an item
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

Update:

I added the tickets to my item def on the client side… So now I have the claim option.

But now I have some issues in game. When I click claim all this pops up on my cmd…

http://prntscr.com/68p2k9

Does anyone know where I should add the action to do the “claim rank?”

Read full topic
item.source: Adding extra options to an item

item.title: Adding extra options to an item
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“portugalrox, post:1, topic:550117”]So I am working on adding a donator rank ticket to a pi server.

I’m using the item 1464 (archery ticket)

So far I have changed everything just working on adding a “claim option” - This I need help with…
Also I have in actionhandler.java to give player the rank and log them off upon this item but I don’t know how to specify it so if I added the “claim” option then a player could click claim and have the rank.[/quote]

This is done client sided, and then programmed through the server. The same method you add custom items, you add custom options to an item too.

Will give you more info after work

Read full topic
